turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call the office for an hour and can't get through!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can help schedule that appointment for you. Please provide your date of birth and the reason for your visit (besides the check-up).

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my date of birth is 03/15/1980. The reason is just a standard check-up, but I also wanted to ask about some ongoing shoulder pain I've been experiencing. Is there enough time for that during the appointment, or will I need a separate one?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check the availability and add a note regarding your shoulder pain. I'm seeing that Dr. Ramirez has openings on Tuesday at 10 AM or Thursday at 2 PM. Which one works better for you? Also, I can't guarentee additional time for your shoulder pain, you would have to ask the doctor directly during the appointment.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tuesday at 10 AM works perfectly. Great, thank you! Also, can you provide me with the clinic's address and any pre-appointment instructions like if I need to fast or bring anything?
